author: Reuters Editorial
title: Azerbaijan brings forward date of presidential election to April 11: decree
text:
BAKU (Reuters) - Azerbaijan has brought forward the date of a planned presidential election to April 11 from Oct. 17, a decree issued by the office of Azeri President Ilham Aliyev said on Monday.
Aliyev, in power since succeeding his father in 2003, has been nominated as the ruling partyâ€™s candidate for the election for what would be his fourth term. So far there are no other candidates.
Reporting by Nailia Bagirova; Writing by Andrew Osborn; Editing by Vladimir Soldatkin
